DOC.brief_summary: PRECISION GOLD prospective , multi-center , single arm , unblinded interventional post market clinical study conduct Europe . The purpose study evaluate asymptomatic cerebral embolic ( ACE ) lesion subject symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation undergo ablation Pulmonary Vein Ablation Catheter ( PVAC ) GOLD .
DOC.brief_title: PRECISION GOLD Post Market Study Europe Pulmonary Vein Ablation Catheter ( PVAC GOLD )
DOC.detailed_description: 10-12 center Europe enroll 56 subject meet inclusion/exclusion criterion provide consent participate study . Subjects undergo ablation paroxysmal AF Medtronic PVAC GOLD ( CE-Mark ) . To assess ACE lesion , pre- post-ablation procedure cerebral MRIs do along neurological exam ( Mini Mental State Exam ) . Subjects follow 1 month post-procedure repeat MRI neurological exam conduct subject positive MRI pre-hospital discharge .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic AF ( > /=2 recurrent AF episodes self terminate AF < /=48 hour cardioverted ) Documentation > /=1 paroxysmal AF event within past year AF symptom ( e.g . palpitation , fatigue , exertional dyspnea , effort intolerance ) Prescribed vitamin K antagonist ( e.g . warfarin/coumadin ) Age 1870 year old Clinically indicate pulmonary vein ablation Willing able give inform consent Willing , able commit participate study require activity duration study Diagnosis persistent permanent AF Prior leave atrial ablation Presence intracardiac thrombus Contraindicated vitamin K antagonist Prescribed direct thrombin factor inhibitor ( e.g . dabigatran , rivaroxaban ) Prescribed investigational drug may confound study result Cardiac valve prosthesis Significant congenital heart defect ( correct ) Pulmonary vein stent Preexisting pulmonary vein stenosis Cerebral ischemic event ( e.g . stroke , TIA ) occur within 6 month study consent date If female pregnancy Participation cardiovascular clinical study Contraindicated MRI Active sepsis Blood clotting abnormality ( genetic ) Presence leave atrial myxoma Venous filtering device ( e.g . Greenfield filter ) Invasive cardiac procedure past 90 day
